title: Results 2019
code: men <- teamstaffel::get_results("M", year = 2019) DT::datatable(men,               rownames = FALSE)

title: Results 2019
code: is_bwb <- grepl(men$team, pattern = "Berliner\\s?Wasserbetriebe") men_bwb <- men[is_bwb, ]  men_bwb$place_bwb <- seq_len(nrow(men_bwb)) men_bwb <- dplyr::select(men_bwb, .data$place_bwb, dplyr::everything())  is_kwb <- stringr::str_extract(men_bwb$team, pattern = "[1-9][0-9]?") %in% 86:87 men_bwb$place_kwb[is_kwb] <- seq_len(sum(is_kwb)) #> Warning: Unknown or uninitialised column: `place_kwb`. men_bwb <- dplyr::select(men_bwb, .data$place_kwb, dplyr::everything())   DT::datatable(men_bwb,               options = list(pageLength = 100),               rownames = FALSE)

title: Results 2022
code: is_bwb <- grepl(men$team, pattern = "Berliner\\s?Wasserbetriebe") men_bwb <- men[is_bwb, ]  men_bwb$place_bwb <- seq_len(nrow(men_bwb)) men_bwb <- dplyr::select(men_bwb, .data$place_bwb, dplyr::everything()) is_kwb <- stringr::str_extract(men_bwb$team, pattern = "[1-9][0-9]?") %in% c(89,91) men_bwb$place_kwb[is_kwb] <- seq_len(sum(is_kwb)) #> Warning: Unknown or uninitialised column: `place_kwb`. men_bwb <- dplyr::select(men_bwb, .data$place_kwb, dplyr::everything())   DT::datatable(men_bwb,               options = list(pageLength = 100),               rownames = FALSE)

title: R Package for Visualising Results from BWB Teamstaffel
text: details install KWB-R packages checkout installation tutorial.
code: ### Optionally: specify GitHub Personal Access Token (GITHUB_PAT) ### See here why this might be important for you: ### https://kwb-r.github.io/kwb.pkgbuild/articles/install.html#set-your-github_pat  # Sys.setenv(GITHUB_PAT = "mysecret_access_token")  # Install package "remotes" from CRAN if (! require("remotes")) {   install.packages("remotes", repos = "https://cloud.r-project.org") }  # Install KWB package 'teamstaffel' from GitHub remotes::install_github("mrustl/teamstaffel")

title: Get Teamstaffel Results Table — get_results
text: sex either "M" men "W" women default: "M" year default: 2022 base_url default: "https://berlin-wasserbetriebe.r.mikatiming.de"

title: Get Teamstaffel Results Table — get_results
code: women <- get_results("W") women #> # A tibble: 59 × 6 #>    place team                     start_number age_class  event_name finish_time #>    <int> <chr>                    <chr>        <chr>      <chr>      <chr>       #>  1     1 Polizei Berlin Frauen    M798         Normals    5 x 5 km … 01:46:09    #>  2     2 LC RON-HILL Berlin F1    M636         Normals    5 x 5 km … 01:52:54    #>  3     3 Carlo 2                  M214         Normals    5 x 5 km … 02:04:52    #>  4     4 HIGGIES                  M1331        Normals    5 x 5 km … 02:04:57    #>  5     5 BerlinerWasserbetriebe51 M1228        Master     5 x 5 km … 02:05:21    #>  6     6 Speed Girls              M926         Normals    5 x 5 km … 02:05:36    #>  7     7 LC Stolpertruppe Bln     M640         Supermast… 5 x 5 km … 02:09:57    #>  8     8 Justiz-Bergsprinterinnen M578         Normals    5 x 5 km … 02:11:21    #>  9     9 Incredible Running Club  M526         Normals    5 x 5 km … 02:17:27    #> 10    10 BSG BML eV Team 3        M198         Normals    5 x 5 km … 02:19:37    #> # … with 49 more rows
